raw_reply: Red, you say? *Craaak!* Ah, red... the color of fresh, spilled blood on new-fallen snow. The glint in a predator's eye just before the pounce. The ripened cherry, so sweet, yet so close to decay. It whispers of hunger, of fury, and of shadows that cling even tighter to vibrant hues. A very... *interesting* color, indeed. *Craaak!*
